name: Frndzk Expandable Bottom Bar
author: Bitto Kazi

sections.description:
Frndzk Expandable Bottom Bar plugin adds a dashing expandable botttom bar in your website. you can set the bottom bar contents from widgets area. The bar expands when you moves your mouse on it. You can set the footer text and other settings from plugin’s settings area. demo plugin developed by bitto kazi

Arbitrary section 1
sections.installation:
1. Upload ‘frndzk-expandable-bottom-bar.zip’ to the ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory and extract the zip file
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

for questions please write here
